name: reinter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to bury a dead body again after it has been removed from the ground where it was buried: The hero was later reinterred with full military honours. The remains will be re-interred when the archaeologists have finished their work. Related words
inter
reinterment
More examplesFewer examplesThe remains of the dead soldiers were removed from the battlefield and reinterred in a modern graveyard.The developers were ordered to re-inter the bodies they had uncovered.The bodies were reinterred in a plot marked by a simple white monument.
